name: Baby Dohar | Crimson Chai
description:
A subtle traditional Indian summer blanket comprised of three layers of pure cotton; the middle layer and edging are block printed with non-toxic natural vegetable dyes, an art form performed by hand for centuries.

The generously sized blanket makes the perfect swaddle, nursing and stroller cover, tummy time sheet, or luxe accessory for that mini jet-setter in your life.

100% cotton. Made in India. 50" x 37.5"

description: A subtle traditional Indian summer blanket comprised of three layers of pure cotton; the middle layer and edging are block printed with non-toxic natural vegetable dyes, an art form performed by hand for centuries. Cranberry and tangerine floral interior. 100% cotton. Handmade in India. 49" x 37.25"

name: Single Dohar | Aqua Caffin
description:
The Hindi word doharana translates to repeating and dohar implies layers. Dohars are made from three sheets of mulmul cotton, an airy, ultra-breathable muslin once exclusive to Indian royalty. Using traditional centuries-old block printing methods, artisans hand-stamp the inside layer and edging in a slow rhythmic process that is considered a form of worship. A pattern is chiseled and carved (by extremely talented hands!) into a block of wood and pressed into the fabric using natural, azo-free dyes. The generously sized dohar is luxe and subtle, and will get softer with every wash. It can be used as a coverlet, lightweight addition over bed linens, in place of a top sheet, or as a simple throw across your favorite chair. Made in India. 100% cotton. 60" x 90"

★ The website features only a taste of our stock and offerings. For dohars not pictured online, email sales@melaandroam.com.

name: Tie and Dye Shawl | Mallard
description:
This supremely soft wool shawl provides plenty of warmth and modern style. After pinching and resist tying each piece, Rajasthani artisans spot dye earthy and jewel toned colors by hand — a process that creates natural variations for a truly unique shawl.

100% wool. Approximately 83" x 43"

name: Tie and Dye Shawl | Scarlet
description:
This supremely soft wool shawl provides plenty of warmth and modern style. After pinching and resist tying each piece, Rajasthani artisans spot dye earthy and jewel toned colors by hand — a process that creates natural variations for a truly unique shawl.

100% wool. Approximately 83" x 43"

name: Kantha Shawl | Lulla
description:
An oversized and lightweight shawl constructed from double layers of vibrant silk.

Each one-of-a-kind piece has been meticulously hand-stitched using traditional West Bengal kantha techniques to bind the layers together. It is believed these items are blessed with protective powers to keep harmful spirits at bay, and they can ensure happiness, fertility and fulfillment, as the artisans stitch their wishes into the fabric.

100% silk. 82" x 34"

description:

name: Weekender | Diboll
description:
Road tested, jet-setter approved.

Designed and crafted by Texas bag builder Stash Co, this one-of-a-kind weekender is constructed from vintage cotton saris and glazed tan leather. The interior is lined in Stash's signature ticking stripe as a nod to being made in a turn of the century mattress factory. Features antique brass hardware, interior zip pocket, reinforced sides and bottom. 21" L x 15" W x 12" H.

name: Naga Tote | I
description: As soon as these handmade, oversized totes were spotted in a bustling Thai Market, we knew they were a Mela & Roam "must have". But even more, Apple, the adorable artist behind each of these beauties is every bit as captivating as the bags she makes. Ideal for weekend getaways and large daily hauls from the market. Mango wood and hand-loomed cotton. Each piece is unique; no two are alike and will vary slightly in size and handle stain color.

description:
A pair of double-sided cotton ikat pillows with kantha stitching. The pillows have been meticulously finished with pleated butterfly corners and hidden zip closures. Feather/down inserts included.

100% cotton. 27" x 27"

name: Vintage Kantha Pillow | Grina 30"
description:
Constructed from vintage Indian sari fabric, this one-of-a-kind, double-sided pillow is the perfect accent for any room. Meticulously finished with tab edging and hidden zip closure; feather/down insert included. As the fabric is vintage, it may possess worn components, patches, or perfectly aged inconsistencies, all of which add to the unique charm and sensibility of the piece.

100% cotton. 30" x 30"

name: Vintage Kantha Throw | Anand
description:
Kantha is an ancient Indian embroidery technique that uses a running stitch to bind several layers of cloth. Made in Bengal from an assortment of vintage cotton saris, this quilt is an upcycled work of art requiring little care—a testament to its quality and hand-craftsmanship. It is believed the artisan sews wishes into the fabric with each stitch.

As the quilt fabrics are vintage, they may possess worn components, patches, or perfectly aged inconsistencies, all of which add to the unique charm and sensibility of the piece.

100% cotton. 87.5" x 63.5"

name: Single Dohar | Pali
description:
The Hindi word doharana translates to repeating and dohar implies layers. Dohars are made from three sheets of mulmul cotton, an airy, ultra-breathable muslin once exclusive to Indian royalty. Using traditional centuries-old block printing methods, artisans hand-stamp the inside layer and edging in a slow rhythmic process that is considered a form of worship. A pattern is chiseled and carved (by extremely talented hands!) into a block of wood and pressed into the fabric using natural, azo-free dyes. The generously sized dohar is luxe and subtle, and will get softer with every wash. It can be used as a coverlet, lightweight addition over bed linens, in place of a top sheet, or as a simple throw across your favorite chair. Made in India. 100% cotton. 60" x 90"

★ The website features only a taste of our stock and offerings. For dohars not pictured online, email sales@melaandroam.com.

★ The website features only a taste of our stock and offerings. For dohars not pictured online, email sales@melaandroam.com.

name: Single Dohar | Royal Ambuja
description:
The Hindi word doharana translates to repeating and dohar implies layers. Dohars are made from three sheets of mulmul cotton, an airy, ultra-breathable muslin once exclusive to Indian royalty. Using traditional centuries-old block printing methods, artisans hand-stamp the inside layer and edging in a slow rhythmic process that is considered a form of worship. A pattern is chiseled and carved (by extremely talented hands!) into a block of wood and pressed into the fabric using natural, azo-free dyes. The generously sized dohar is luxe and subtle, and will get softer with every wash. It can be used as a coverlet, lightweight addition over bed linens, in place of a top sheet, or as a simple throw across your favorite chair. Made in India. 100% cotton. 60" x 90"

★ The website features only a taste of our stock and offerings. For dohars not pictured online, email sales@melaandroam.com.

name: Baby Dohar | Kotli
description:
A subtle traditional Indian summer blanket comprised of three layers of pure cotton; the middle layer and edging are block printed with non-toxic natural vegetable dyes, an art form performed by hand for centuries.

The generously sized blanket makes the perfect swaddle, nursing and stroller cover, tummy time sheet, or luxe accessory for that mini jet-setter in your life.

100% cotton. Made in India. 50" x 37.5"

name: Kantha Shawl | Aadi
description:
An oversized and lightweight shawl constructed from double layers of vibrant silk.

Each one-of-a-kind piece has been meticulously hand-stitched using traditional West Bengal kantha techniques to bind the layers together. It is believed these items are blessed with protective powers to keep harmful spirits at bay, and they can ensure happiness, fertility and fulfillment, as the artisans stitch their wishes into the fabric.

100% silk. Handmade in India. 80" x 35"

name: Chikan Silk Scarf | Chartreuse
description:
Chikan is a traditional embroidery style from Lucknow, India that draws inspiration from Persia. Each intricate, hand-embroidered scarf is one-of-a-kind.

100% silk. 21" x 67"

name: Kurta Pajamas | Horn OK Please
description: Designed for children's comfort, every sweet detail of Amba's two-piece pajama set was considered: hand-block printed with azo-free dyes that won’t irritate the skin, hand-woven from pure cotton, and an easy, cozy, unisex fit that includes a long sleeve kurta top with side slits, elastic waist pants, and enclosed seams. The pajamas feature kitschy ticker stripes that read Horn OK Please, the mantra of the Indian highway and a phrase famously painted across the backs of commercial trucks and buses. A portion of the sales is used to fund programs reviving traditional textile arts and the training of weavers, dyers and block print artisans in Maheshwar, Jaipur, and Sawantwadi.

name: Mini Mughal Tent
description:
Hand-crafted from organic cotton canvas and topped with two wood finials, this indoor play tent will take your daydream believer on a world of adventure. Mini mattress and hand-printed striped bolster pillow included. Assembly required.

Made in India. 60"H, 42"W, 60"D

name: Indian Rickshaw
description: This genuine Indian rickshaw features a collapsible canopy, seat, armrests, and footrest reupholstered with vintage saris. The seat lifts to reveal handy storage for a tire pump and discoveries along your journey.

name: Luxor Settee
description: This cushy antique settee boasts a walnut frame and sits atop the original casters. Upholstered in a lively garden inspired vintage sari, it's the perfect piece to brighten any nook or entry. One-of-a-kind.

name: Lilly Chair
description: With a sculptural and refined upholstered frame, this preppy chair is our take on Palm Beach chic. Plump tight back and an extra deep seat provide sink-in comfort.

name: Idar Chair
description: Low-slung streamlined wingback upholstered in vintage Indian cotton saris make this chair a true one-of-a-kind piece.

name: Matador Chair
description: With a streamlined silhouette, the Matador Chair is both comfortable and complementary. The sturdy high-backed seat is upholstered in vintage sari fabric perched atop natural walnut legs, lending an upbeat, modern global feel to a study or living room. One-of-a-kind.

name: Holi Chair
description:
This one-of-a-kind vintage armchair is reupholstered in neon-like vibrant saris and features fabric-covered legs and stretchers to complete the statement.

27" L x 33.5" W x 42" H
Seat 22" H

name: Tulum Barrel Chair
description: A 1920s barrel-back tub chair makes a bold statement upholstered in graphic navy blue and orange vintage saris. The deep, low seat and encompassing arms create the ultimate spot for reading and relaxing.

name: Canggu Chair
description: This one-of-a-kind vintage armchair is reupholstered in raspberry and tangerine-toned saris and features a sophisticated profile with squared-off curves.

name: Petite Saaras Chair
description:
A petite, one-of-a-kind chair reupholstered in vintage swan-patterned cotton saris. Graceful sweeping form with a cushy new seat for maximum comfort.

28"H, 24"L, 22.5"W
Seat: 15"H

This item is only available for delivery within the continental United States. Shipment to international locations, U.S. territories, AK, HI, P.O. boxes, APO/FPO addresses and express ship methods are unavailable.

name: Lochan Chair
description: One-of-a-kind, motley vintage bergère custom-upholstered in Indian kantha quilts. New deep-set seat perfect for perching, sprawling, and curling.
